MS.S: PowerShell module with commands for discovering, installing, updating and publishing the PowerShell artifacts like Modules, Scripts, and DSC Resources.

## 1.1.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fix_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix to retrieve all metadata properties when finding a PSResource from a ContainerRegistry repository (#1799)_x000D__x000A_- Update README.md (#1798)_x000D__x000A_- Use authentication challenge for unauthenticated ContainerRegistry repository (#1797)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for Install-PSResource with varying digit version against ContainerRegistry repository (#1796)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for updating ContainerRegistry dependency parsing logic to account for AzPreview package (#1792)_x000D__x000A_- Add wildcard support for MAR repository for FindAll and FindByName (#1786)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for nuspec dependency version range calculation for RequiredModules (#1784)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.1.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fix_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for publishing .nupkg file to ContainerRegistry repository (#1763)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for PMPs like Artifactory needing modified filter query parameter to proxy upstream (#1761)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for ContainerRegistry repository to parse out dependencies from metadata (#1766)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for Install-PSResource Null pointer occurring when package is present only in upstream feed in ADO (#1760)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for local repository casing issue on Linux (#1750)_x000D__x000A_- Update README.md (#1759)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for case sensitive License.txt when RequireLicense is specified (#1757)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for broken -Quiet parameter for Save-PSResource (#1745)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.1.0-rc3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fix_x000D__x000A_- Include missing commits_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.1.0-RC2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### New Features_x000D__x000A_- Full Microsoft Artifact Registry integration (#1741)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Update to use OCI v2 APIs for Container Registry (#1737)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fixes for finding and installing from local repositories on Linux machines (#1738)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for finding package name with 4 part version from local repositories (#1739) _x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.1.0-RC1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### New Features_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Group Policy configurations for enabling or disabling PSResource repositories (#1730)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fix packaging name matching when searching in local repositories (#1731)_x000D__x000A_- `Compress-PSResource` `-PassThru` now passes `FileInfo` instead of string (#1720)_x000D__x000A_- Fix for `Compress-PSResource` not properly compressing scripts (#1719) _x000D__x000A_- Add `AcceptLicense` to Save-PSResource (#1718 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A_- Better support for NuGet v2 feeds (#1713 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A_- Better handling of `-WhatIf` support in `Install-PSResource` (#1531 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix for some nupkgs failing to extract due to empty directories (#1707 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix for searching for `-Name *` in `Find-PSResource` (#1706 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.1.0-preview2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### New Features_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- New cmdlet `Compress-PSResource` which packs a package into a .nupkg and saves it to the file system (#1682, #1702)_x000D__x000A_- New `-Nupkg` parameter for `Publish-PSResource` which pushes pushes a .nupkg to a repository (#1682)_x000D__x000A_- New `-ModulePrefix` parameter for `Publish-PSResource` which adds a prefix to a module name for container registry repositories to add a module prefix.This is only used for publishing and is not part of metadata. MAR will drop the prefix when syndicating from ACR to MAR (#1694)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Add prerelease string when NormalizedVersion doesn't exist, but prelease string does (#1681 Thanks @sean-r-williams)_x000D__x000A_- Add retry logic when deleting files (#1667 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix broken PAT token use (#1672)_x000D__x000A_- Updated error messaging for authenticode signature failures (#1701)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.1.0-preview1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### New Features_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Support for Azure Container Registries (#1495, #1497-#1499, #1501, #1502, #1505, #1522, #1545, #1548, #1550, #1554, #1560, #1567, _x000D__x000A_#1573, #1576, #1587, #1588, #1589, #1594, #1598, #1600, #1602, #1604, #1615)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fix incorrect request URL when installing resources from ADO (#1597 Thanks @anytonyoni!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix for swallowed exceptions (#1569)_x000D__x000A_- Fix for PSResourceGet not working in Constrained Languange Mode (#1564)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.6_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Bump System.Text.Json to 8.0.5_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## [1.0.5](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSResourceGet/compare/v1.0.4.1...v1.0.5) - 2024-05-13_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_- Update @sean-r-williams!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix unnecessary `and` for version globbing in V2ServerAPICalls (#1644 Thanks again @sean-r-williams!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix requiring `tags` in server response (#1627 Thanks @evelyn-bi!)_x000D__x000A_- Add 10 minute timeout to HTTPClient (#1626)_x000D__x000A_- Fix save script without `-IncludeXml` (#1609, #1614 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A_- PAT token fix to translate into HttpClient 'Basic Authorization'(#1599 Thanks @gerryleys!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix incorrect request url when installing from ADO (#1597 Thanks @antonyoni!)_x000D__x000A_- Improved exception handling (#1569)_x000D__x000A_- Ensure that .NET methods are not called in order to enable use in Constrained Language Mode (#1564)_x000D__x000A_- PSResourceGet packaging (#1549)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for creating temp home directory on Unix (#1544)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for creating `InstalledScriptInfos` directory when it does not exist (#1542)_x000D__x000A_- Bug
